rooms.description: Large open living area with floor-to-ceiling West-facing windows designed in a Brutalist style using raw concrete and exposed structure. Vastu principles ensure that the living room is oriented towards the west to promote positive energy flow.

Compact kitchen integrated with the living area. Incorporates robust concrete finishes and simple lines in keeping with Brutalist aesthetics while meeting local building norms for safety and ventilation.
Functional bathroom located near the kitchen to maximize utility; designed using minimalist elements aligned with Vastu guidelines.
Spacious bedroom designed for optimum privacy and comfort. Exposed concrete walls with integrated built-ins add to the Brutalist character while ensuring proper alignment with Vastu principles.

openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling windows designed to maximize natural light and maintain strong connection with the outdoors while following Vastu for optimal energy flow.
